description:
Forget about cold hands on the track or the trail. The Wind Block Mitts are made from premium 3-layer softshell fabric for weather protection and a soft, fleecy liner to stave off chills.

  • 3-layer softshell with Dry-Tex waterproof membrane keep hands warm and dry
  • 160g Clomax® synthetic insulation on the back and 60g PrimaLoft® Gold Eco Grip Control on the palm
  • Brushed polyester tricot fleece liner is soft and cozy against the skin
  • Durable synthetic leather palm provides good grip
  • Reflective details add visibility as the days get shorter
name: MEC T3 Warmest Wind Block Mitts - Unisex
